data.displayName: Standing Offer Gas - Multinet Yarra Valley

fees.description:
This fee is passed through from your distributor and may vary. Please visit your distributor's website to find out the current fee.
We reserve the right to and will notify you if we change or impose additional fees or charges in relation to your energy supply. Fees and charges charged by the distributor are published on the Multinet website and may change from time to time.
Reconnection fee.This fee is passed through from your distributor and may vary. Please visit your distributor's website to find out the current fee.

gasContract.terms: Eligibility criteria apply, for terms and conditions see alintaenergy.com.au/termsandconditions or call 13 37 02.
gasContract.variation: Alinta Energy will notify you in advance of any tariff or price variation in accordance with applicable laws.

eligibility.information: This Energy Plan is only available to customers with an applicable network tariff.

gasContract.onExpiryDescription: This offer has no contract term.
